ChatGPT has not requested permission so how do I, without a request from a site, choose to grant them permission to access and use the mic on the laptop so that I can simply talk to it?

title: Firefox Update wiped my cookies, tab groups, and settings
content:
So Firefox just wiped my cookies, my tabs, including my tab groups, and my settings in both about:preferences and about:config after an update. My history, passwords, and extensions are still intact, so it was not a true refresh. I can deal with the settings and cookies again, but my tab groups are nigh-unrecoverable. "Recently closed window" is greyed out, so that did not help either.

In the "Add Tab to Group -> Closed Groups", my old tab groups are still listed, but as far as I am aware there isn't support to access them yet.

I checked the root profile folder and, following the instructions from this thread, managed to fetch my tab groups from previous.jsonlz4 and recovery.jsonlz4.However, I could not for the life of me get mozlz4 to launch.

Additionally, I have an older backup of the same profile from 2 weeks earlier. This backup also confirms there was some unspecified data wipe, since it is 2GB more than the current profile folder.

With the available recovery data at hand, I have a couple of outcomes that I can live with.

  1. I can indiscriminately replace my current profile with the old backup and hope that when I restart Firefox will correct itself to match the current version.
  2. Someone could help/instruct me on which files to pinpoint to recover my site data/cookies/tab groups discriminately from all the files in the backup, so I don't have to fully replace the current profile.
  3. Someone could help me troubleshoot the guide outlined in the link above to figure out why mozlz4 is not working.

This has been driving me nuts over the past 24 hours and I honestly do feel like I'm a bit out of my depths. Any help is appreciated.

title: Firefox crashing on launch after updates
content:
As title: after running updates, Firefox consistently crashes when launching.

To give more concrete details:

-Running on Linux, specifically KDE Fedora 42. Firefox was updated to 142 from 141, alongside various other updates. -When launching Firefox from any source (directly, through a link, through the terminal etc.), the only window that appears is the crash reporter. -This issue occurs when launching in safe mode. Removing and reinstalling Firefox, including deleting the entire .mozilla folder in Home at the same time does not resolve the issue. I am unable to test rolling Firefox back to 141. -When attempting to launch from the terminal (safe mode or otherwise), the following is output (personal info redacted):

restorecon: SELinux: Could not get canonical path for /home/[username]/.mozilla/firefox/*/gmp-widevinecdm/* restorecon: No such file or directory.

/usr/include/c++/15/array:210: constexpr std::array<_Tp, _Nm>::value_type& std::array<_Tp, _Nm>::operator[](size_type) [with _Tp = HeaderBarButtonType; long unsigned int _Nm = 3; reference = HeaderBarButtonType&; size_type = long unsigned int]: Assertion '__n < this->size()' failed.

Redirecting call to abort() to mozalloc_abort

[ExceptionHandler generates a minidump etc.]

Gtk-Message: [timestamp]: Failed to load module "appmenu-gtk-module"

(I would note that to the best of my knowledge I had not included a plugin for decoding widevine in my Firefox setup, and certainly the Firefox 141 instance on the device being used to write this post (same OS) does not include it) -The crash files in the .mozilla folder, meanwhile, consistently list a segfault at address 0x0.

Any advice on diagnosing/solving this issue would be greatly appreciated. Let me know if there's any other information that would be helpful.

If it would be more appropriate, I could report this through Mozilla's bugzilla instance, but given the issue seems to be very niche (Fedora's ABRT shows a total of 5 unique affected users in the last few days) I am unsure whether flagging this there would be appropriate.
creator: yetanotheruser

title: How do I get rid of the Google Workspace Voice 'G' tab in Firefox Open Tabs
content:
I use Chrome and Firefox as my browsers all the time with Firefox the default one. In Chrome i use Voice Search when I'm tired and can't be bothered typing. I have not being able to use voice search in Firefox and all my attempts have failed. Last week I saw Google Voice (https://workspace.google.com/products/voice/), downloaded it but discovered it is not available to use in my Region. I gave up and resigned myself to typing in Firefox. A few days layer I noticed a 'G' tab with my open tabs. When I closed it another one appeared and I could not get rid of it. The X to close the tab is missing and when I use close tab from the right click menu the 'G' tab closes but another one opens beside it. I didn't subscribe to Workspace. If I copy the tab to Chrome I can delete it without it reopening.

# * # I just tried overwriting the tab with this message and then duplicated this Mozilla tab and was able to delete it without 'G' popping up again. I may have resolved the problem but if so I would like to know why it happened. I tried changing the search engines in FF and that didn't work. As soon as Google knew I was using Firefox they lost interest in helping me.

OVERWRITING DID NOT WORK.

Have I missed a simple fix? Is there a way to have voice search in Firefox?

title: Lost log in details recovery
content:
Hello Firefox Team,

On May 26th, I reinstalled Windows 11 and attempted to log into my Firefox account. Since I had forgotten my password, I had to reset it. After logging in with the new password, I noticed that all my previously saved logins (over 100 entries) were gone.

I understand that Firefox Sync encrypts data and that resetting the password might affect previously synced information. However, I‚Äôd like to confirm whether there is any way for Mozilla to help me recover these lost logins, or if they are permanently deleted after a password reset.

Any guidance or confirmation on this matter would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you, Himash Ravihansa. My Firefox Account Email - himashravihansa@gmail.com
creator: himashravihansa

content: PERCEBI H√Å ALGUNS MESES E AT√â O MOMENTO TOTAL IMPEDIMENTO DE CONTINUAR COMO OURO E BLOQUEIO TOTAL INCLUSIVE PELO BANCO ONDE SOU CLIENTE GOV.BR EST√Å COMPLETAMENTE RACKEADO ,ATRAV√âS DE VPN E SWITCHS CLANDESTINOS SNOS POSTE DE DISTRIBUI√á√ÉO INTERNET FIBRA E A NORMAL ,COMUMENTE CHAMADA DE CABEADA. A FRAUDE ATINGE DESDE O DETRAN AO COMANDO LESTE , DADOS N√ÉO S√ÉO COESOS. E A SOLU√á√ÉO SUGESTIONADA S√ÉO V√Å ALI ,L√Å L√Å OU ACOL√Å ,PODE SER QUE....???? ESTES DADOS S√ÉO ASSINCRONIZADOS ,E INFORMADOS POR AGENTES POSSIVELMENTE TERCEIRIZADOS E CUMPRIDORES DE HOR√ÅRIO TRABALHISTA E DESVINCULADOS DE QUALQUER INTERESSE COM A POSI√á√ÉO QUE OCUPAM. NO DETRAN COMO IDOSO ,CHEIGUEI A PAGAR PARA INSERIR OS DADOS DOS DOCUMENTOS DE IDENTIDADE , E AO RECLAMAR NA OUVIDORIA DA IDENTIFICA√á√ÉO CIVIL , UMA SENHORA APARENTEMENTE TERCEIRIZADA NA RECEP√á√ÉO NEGOU ACESSO AO RESPONS√ÅVEL DESTE SETOR CIVIL DE IDENTIFICA√á√ÉO. SUSPEITO QUE MEUS DOCUMENTOS ESTEJAM PARCIALMENTE SENDO USADO POSSIVELMENTE POR OUTRA PESSOA E POR ISSO MEUS DADOS N√ÉO S√ÉO CRUZADOS O QUE CONFIGURA ATO IL√çCITOS DENTRO DO SETOR ,POIS O CERTIFICADO DE RESERVISTA ELES N√ÉO ACEITAM ( ATENDENTES TERCEIRIZADOS DESCOMPROMISSADOS COM A FUN√á√ÉO QUE OCUPAM) N√ÉO √â A PRIMEIRA VEZ QUE ACONTECE ,DA OUTRA VEZ QUANDO FUI MORAR EM GOIAS TIREI OUTRA IDENTIDADE NO SSPGO .ONDE NUNCA TIVE PROBLEMAS ,MAS DEVIDO CONSTANTES SITUA√á√ïES DE SEGURAN√áA AT√çPICAS ,TENTEI NORMALIZAR TUDO USANDO O SISTEMA DE IDENTIFICA√á√ÉO DO DETRAN NO R.J.. PARA TEREM ID√âIA H√Å VINTE QUATRO ANOS PARA REVALIDAR MINHA CHN . O APP GOV.BR PASSOU A SER UM DESASTRE PARA IMPEDIR CRUZAMENTO DE DADOS E DERREPENTE AS AUTORIDADES CONSTRASTAREM COM PENCAS DE FRAUDES. DOU T√âCNICO EM ELETR√îNICA E OPERADOR TECNICO EM ROB√ìTICA SUBMARINA E FUI APOSSENTADO COMO IDOSO PELO INSS DA CIDADE DO SENHOR DO BOM FIM NA BAHIA ,E AT√â O MOMENTO RECEBO SAL√ÅRIO M√çNIMO. N√ÉO ENTENDO COMO ESSAS FRAUDES S√ÉO OFICIALIZADAS COMO LEGAL. PRECISO DE ORIENTA√á√ÉO SE √â QUE ESTE CANSL TAMB√âM J√Å FOI BANALIZADO. OBRIGADO.
